title: Cross-Cultural Collaborative Learning Design Based on Facebook

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital communication skills and experience using social media
context.additional_context: Online collaborative environment referencing Taiwan-U.S. university student cultural exchange project cases. Requires Facebook as primary platform with Web 2.0 tool supplementation

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective communication strategies in cross-cultural collaborative projects using Facebook.
Learners can analyze cultural differences arising during collaboration and propose adjustment measures.
Learners can establish at least two personal strategies to sustain social networks after project completion.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
